Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41725 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.19.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-41725 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.19.5-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is earlier than 1.19.5-1, affected by CVE-2022-41725
